2013-14 Women's Golf Roster

Choose a Player:

Lesley Atkins

Height 5-4

Class Freshman

Hometown Harwick Scotland

High School Loretto School

Bio

Related

Biography

Collegiate Bests

18-Hole Total: 75: 36th Annual FIU Pat Bradley Invitational (10/21/13)

36-Hole Total: 152: 36th Annual FIU Pat Bradley Invitational (10/21-22/13)

54-Hole Total: 230: 36th Annual FIU Pat Bradley Invitational (10/20-22/13)

Top Finish: T-46th: 36th Annual FIU Pat Bradley Invitational (10/20-22/13)

###

Freshman (2013-14): Appeared in three of four events during the fall, starting two...was the No. 5 starter for the Mary Fossum Invitational and Golfweek Conference Challenge...her top finish was 46th at the FIU Pat Bradley Invitational with a 14-over (230).

Prior to FIU: Had a standout amateur career where she has been a Scottish Girls National Champion, Scottish Schools Girls Champion, Independent Schools Golf Association (ISGA) Girls Champion and a member of Scottish Under-18 Team that competed at the European Championships in Finland (2009), Germany (2012) and Sweden (2013)...was a qualifier for the 2011 Daily Telegraph Grand Finals, played in Abu Dhabi...in 2012, won the Paul Lawrie Foundation Scottish Schoolgirls golf championship, played over the Murrayshall House Hotel courses near Perth, and the inaugural Independent Schools’ Golf Association Scottish Open, which took place at King’s Acre in Edinburgh, in the span of a week...won the individual Scottish School Girls title with a three-under-par second round of 68 over the Murrayshall No. 1 course, which gave her a 36-hole total of 141...secured victory at the premier Independent Schools one day stroke play event, which is open to any pupil that attends an independent school...attended the Loretto School in Edinburgh and was a member of their Golf Academy...winner of the Individual Girls Competition with an impressive gross score of 75...other notable achievements have been Mackie Bowl Champion - new Gullane course record of 69 (-5); member of Scottish U-18 Team at Home Internationals since she was 13; winner of Scottish Region of U-18 Faldo Series; third in the U-18 Andalucia European Junior Open; HMC Foursomes Champions with Loretto School; and Intercollegiate Champions with the Loretto School; Captain of the Loretto Golf Academy in 2012/2013 and winner of 2013 Order of Merit (50+male & female players).
